activation_blockers: Update `rule_specs/*/00_base_rule.yml` to include `severity` and `remediation_hint` across product rule sets
Implement product evaluator adapters under `strategy_e/adapters/` mapping `evaluate(resource)` -> `run_pipeline_on_text`
Add minimal unit tests and CI validations for adapters and promoted schemas
Assign owners for promoted schema and rule registry updates

activation_steps_schema.action: Create small product-scoped PR with template content, fill required canonical fields, add sample resource, run schema validation
validation_steps: Include sample resource for smoke test

activation_steps_schema.description: CI: Add schema validation job for promoted product schemas
activation_steps_schema.action: Add CI job that runs JSON/YAML schema validation on changed `products/*/schema.yml` files
validation_steps: Fail PR if schema validation fails

activation_steps_rules.action: Add at least one concrete rule per product linking to the promoted schema fields
Regenerate `ai_reports/rule_registry_audit.json` and ensure no template-only rule sets remain

activation_steps_rules.description: Integrate rule registry audits into CI
activation_steps_rules.action: Add CI check to fail PRs that leave template-only rule sets

activation_steps_evaluators.description: Create canonical adapter (pipeline) and document adapter API
activation_steps_evaluators.action: Implement canonical mapping `evaluate(resource)` -> `run_pipeline_on_text` (scaffold in `strategy_e/adapters/pipeline_adapter.py`) and publish adapter API README
Create `strategy_e/adapters/<product>_adapter.py` modules exposing `evaluate(resource)`, validating input against promoted schema, normalizing outputs to violations + remediation_hint

activation_steps_evaluators.description: Add adapter unit and integration tests
activation_steps_evaluators.action: Add unit tests that use sample resources from promoted product schemas and CI job to run them

activation_steps_evaluators.description: Add CI job to run adapter tests
activation_steps_evaluators.action: Ensure adapters are validated on PRs

activation_order: SCHEMA-S1 (promote schemas per product, single-product PRs)
EVAL-E1 (implement canonical pipeline adapter and doc)
RULE-R1 (update base rule templates across products)
RULE-R4 (integrate rule registry audits into CI)
Governance: Assign owners and approve PRs (final authorization)
notes: Activation plan is dependency-driven and prefers small, single-product PRs to reduce review friction. The canonical adapter should be implemented early to allow adapter scaffolds to call into the executor. After the listed steps and CI validations are completed, rerun Phase-3 readiness scans to confirm gate transitions and allow activation.
